title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Elementary Mathematics Online Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can complete smartphone-based collaborative tasks once weekly for two weeks in randomly assigned online small groups of three
Learners can create mathematics lesson design projects incorporating peer feedback using synchronous/asynchronous collaboration tools
Learners can apply at least three communication strategies to build social cohesion during online collaborative processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
